name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Search: Instantly Search Your Chat Logs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to search through ChatGPT chats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üîç With this Google Chrome extension, you can easily search through all your ChatGPT conversations, making it a breeze to find important information and revisit previous discussions.

Key Features:
‚ú® Instant Search: Quickly search through all your ChatGPT chats directly from the website or from anywhere with the Chrome Extension Popup.
üõ†Ô∏è Easy Setup: Simply install the extension, open the ChatGPT website, and you're ready to go.

How to Use:
Install the Extension: Click on the "Add to Chrome" button to install the extension.
Load Chats: Open ChatGPT and scroll through your chat sidebar to load all chats.
Search: Use the search bar embedded on the website to find any conversation by title or keywords, or through the extension popup.

Additional Information:
Version: 1.2
Permissions: Requires access to storage to save chat data through IndexedDB.
